issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

fields.summary: After CC goes out of service (ex disk dies) instances are not able to stop/terminate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I've noticed with two failed instances (1 instance store, and another  BFEBS instance),  instances remaining in pending state for hours/days and are not failing out. 
These instances currently do not and appear never to have existed on the esx hosts. I do not see any event history in the esx client logs, or vm summary. 
I attempted to terminate one of these instances and it has remained in the shutting-down state for at least 24 hours, and through a clc service restart. Prior to restarting the CLC the Availability Zone was showing a lack of resources due to the failed instance store instance stuck in pending/shutting-down. 
I have not debugged cause of each instance failures yet,  but guessing something is timing out due to the large (18G) size of the  instance store image and/or snapshot. 


{code}


[root@c-11 ~]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-105A4395	540654688645	test
INSTANCE	i-F2704035	emi-161B4201	10.111.101.107	1.106.34.27	shutting-down	test	0		m3.xlarge	2013-09-07T05:15:12.383Z	PARTI01		monitoring-disabled	10.111.101.107	1.106.34.27			instance-store											
TAG	instance	i-F2704035	euca:node	10.111.5.18
RESERVATION	r-35FA4023	540654688645	test
INSTANCE	i-2E143FAB	emi-385C3DDE	1.106.34.28	1.106.34.28	pending	test	0		m3.xlarge	2013-09-19T03:38:39.419Z	PARTI01			monitoring-disabled	1.106.34.28	1.106.34.28			ebs											
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sda	vol-4E013F54	2013-09-19T03:38:39.830Z	true		
TAG	instance	i-2E143FAB	euca:node	10.111.5.18
[root@c-11 ~]# euca-describe-nodes 
NODE	PARTI00		10.111.1.14	ENABLED	
NODE	PARTI01		10.111.1.99	ENABLED	
NODE	PARTI01		10.111.5.18	ENABLED	
INSTANCE	i-F2704035
INSTANCE	i-2E143FAB
